DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study assess efficacy safety Mircera ( methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta ) clinical practice patient chronic kidney disease , pre-dialysis dialysis , initiate Mircera treatment . Data patient collect 12 month treatment .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Mircera ( Methoxy Polyethylene Glycol-Epoetin Beta ) Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease Pre-Dialysis Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Chronic kidney disease , predialysis dialysis Appropriate treatment Mircera accord current guideline Summary Product Characteristics Anemia due nonrenal cause Pregnant lactate woman Uncontrolled hypertension Known hypersensitivity methoxy polyethylene glycolepoetin beta
